quote: For my 16th birthday, my family took me to L'Auberge de L'Ill, which was family-run but had three Michelin stars. It was a revelation. After that meal, I realised this is what I want to do.
quote_letters: FOR MY '1''6'TH BIRTHDAY MY FAMILY TOOK ME TO LAUBERGE DE LILL WHICH WAS FAMILY-RUN BUT HAD THREE MICHELIN STARS IT WAS A REVELATION AFTER THAT MEAL I REALISED THIS IS WHAT I WANT TO DO
